Hah! I managed to get a hold of a comp with a dial up connection. 
*shudders*

Anyway, SC:BW is definately one of the best RTS games our right now, 
but I'd have to say that it ties Emperor - Battle for Dune. That game 
ROCKS! =) The best integration of 3d animation into a RTS game 
around. I  LIVE to see the worm explode from the sand to eat some of 
the enemy units... or mine but still worth it!

LOL -- Lurker, it is quite difficult for me to play on battle.net, 
not because I have problems with the game, but because you won't find 
any games that I own that I've bought. =P ANYTHING can be downloaded. 
=) I suggest you download Kahn.

Also, Lurker, I suggest that you hold your position for now with the 
carriers and the new characters. I would also ask you to supply 
detailed descriptions of base defenses, the abilities of the ships, 
and descriptions of the characters that you are bringing in. If the 
council is going to discuss anything, we need to be present. =P And, 
most, if not all, of the council is away.

WHO IS KYLE STEWART?!? =) 

--- Lokk / Axis / Lynxiz ---

Lokk continues his barrage of bullets at Deemos firing the rest of 
his clip. (20 bullets) He ducks behind the side of the mountain, and 
starts to reload. <Gotta  make them believe that the are surrounded 
and they are losing... commmon!> He fumbles with his clip and drops 
it in his nervous haste. He picks up his clip and keeps reloading.

Axis's charging laser keeps charging, almost at full power for anothe 
round of fire. He launches another missile at Stranato headed at the 
last location he targeted. (meaning, he arc'd the missile over the 
pod and it is heading towards where the last missile he fired landed, 
which will most likely miss, just clarifying =P)

Lynxiz sprints around, just out of visible range, and sets Trinity 
down. She starts to tend to Trinity's wounds.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Only the best f*cking RTS in the world! Starcraft!
